ch.fhnw.swc.mrs.data

Interface UserDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLUserDAO

    public interface UserDAO
extends DAO
    Data Access Object that provides access to the underlying database. Use this DAO to access User related data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(User user)
      Remove a user from the database.
      List<User> getAll()
      Retrieve all users stored in this system.
      User getById(int id)
      Retrieve a user by his/her identification.
      List<User> getByName(String name)
      Retrieve a user by his/her name.
      void saveOrUpdate(User user)
      Persist a User object.

      • Methods inherited from interface ch.fhnw.swc.mrs.data.DAO

        dispose

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        User getById(int id)
        Retrieve a user by his/her identification.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identification of the user object to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the user with the given identification or null if none found.

      • getAll

        List<User> getAll()
        Retrieve all users stored in this system.
        Returns:
        a list of all users.

      • saveOrUpdate

        void saveOrUpdate(User user)
        Persist a User object. Use this method either when storing a new User object or for updating an existing one.
        Parameters:
        user - the object to persist.

      • delete

        void delete(User user)
        Remove a user from the database. After this operation the user does not exist any more in the database. Make sure to dispose the object too!
        Parameters:
        user - the User to remove.

      • getByName

        List<User> getByName(String name)
        Retrieve a user by his/her name. Use the family name to retrieve a list of all users with that name. Note this method does not support wildcards!
        Parameters:
        name - the family name of the users to retrieve.
        Returns:
        a list of users with the given name.
